title: MINI - worldwide sales volume 2006 to 2018
summary: MINI reported Sales units of 371881 million units in 2017 , a record high for the firm .
After 2008 , its Sales units increased , consistently posted above 90 million units each Year .
Why is Sales units important ? Sales units gives an idea of how much money a firm takes in , subtracting the cost of goods and services sold .
gold: Deliveries of BMW MINI-badged cars stood at about 361,500 units in 2018.
BMW has operated the MINI brand since 2000 and adapted the trademark compact style originally designed by Birmingham-based British Motor Corporation ( BMC ) to meet modern preferences.
In the UK , the MINI brand was launched with great success .
